name: RSTL_COMP_RTF_VAL_PTR
description: This table stores the rows in table RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG with rich text results for a component.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated component value in the result. Together with VALUE_GROUP_LINE, this forms the foreign key to the RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple rich text results associated with the result and result component from the RES_COMPONENTS table.

columns.name: VALUE_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a portion of rich text results associated with a component in the RES_COMPONENTS table.
